perturbation.original_text:
16.PAYMENT	OF TRANSPORTATION CHARGES:
Subject to any provisions to the contrary in a TSA between Carrier and Shipper:


A.	Shipper or Consignee shall pay, as provided below, all applicable transportation and other charges (including any deficiency payments
set out in a TSA) accruing on Products handled by Carrier.


B.	All payments are due on the later of: (1) within fifteen (15) days of receipt of the invoice; (2) the twenty-seventh (27th) of the month
following receipt of the invoice, or; (3) if the twenty-seventh (27th) of the month following receipt of the invoice is not a Business Day,
on the next Business Day thereafter.
perturbation.changed_text:
19.12 No Inducements. No director, employee, or agent of any Party shall give or receive any commission, fee, rebate, gift, or entertainment of significant cost or value in connection with this Agreement.

16.PAYMENT	OF TRANSPORTATION CHARGES:
Subject to any provisions to the contrary in a TSA between Carrier and Shipper:


A.	Shipper or Consignee shall pay, as provided below, all applicable transportation and other charges (including any deficiency payments
set out in a TSA) accruing on Products handled by Carrier.


B.	All payments are due on the receipt of the invoice.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the clauses that define the time for payments, it makes it vague, and adds a contradiction by simplifying to 'payment are due on the receipt of the invoice.' This makes the disclosure unclear.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Relevant contract and commercial law regarding payment terms.

perturbation.original_text:
12.4 Jurisdiction and Venue. The Parties hereby irrevocably consent to the exclusive jurisdiction of the state or federal courts located in Harris
County, Texas. The Parties hereby irrevocably and unconditionally waive, to the fullest extent they may legally and effectively do so, any objection
which they may now or hereafter have to the laying of venue of any suit, action or proceeding arising out of or relating to this Agreement or the
transactions contemplated hereby in any federal or state court located in Harrison County, Texas.
perturbation.changed_text: 12.4 Jurisdiction and Venue. The Parties hereby irrevocably consent to the exclusive jurisdiction of the state or federal courts located in Harrison County, Texas. The Parties agree to allow any jurisdiction for disputes.
perturbation.explanation: The insertion of the clause 'The parties agree to allow any jurisdiction for disputes' into the "Jurisdiction and Venue" section introduces a contradiction. The first sentence establishes exclusive jurisdiction in Harrison County, Texas, while the second sentence effectively nullifies this by permitting disputes to be resolved in any jurisdiction.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Contract law principles regarding jurisdiction and venue clauses.

perturbation.original_text: 12.6 Waiver of Jury Trial. The Parties hereby waive all rights to a trial by jury for any and all Disputes.
perturbation.changed_text: 12.6 Waiver of Jury Trial. The Parties may consider waiving all rights to a trial by jury for any and all Disputes.
perturbation.explanation: The change from 'hereby waive' to 'may consider waiving' significantly weakens the enforceability of the jury trial waiver. By introducing uncertainty and optionality, the modified clause contradicts the original's clear and binding commitment to waive jury trials.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Seventh Amendment to the United States Constitution; contract law principles concerning the enforceability of waivers.
